Lame Fact About Dan #25

14 Jul 2007

I get excited every time someone writes about me.

I met Sarah Jansen at the downstairs bar during Brisbane Improv Festival. She was quite lovely and, it turns out, an arts writer. And she wrote about me. Thanks Sarah!

Dan Walmsley
CTO, NationBuilder
